external_games.name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3: Race with Team Sonic

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3: Race with Team Sonic
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 3: Race with Team Sonic is a promotional browser-mobile game based on the Sonic the Hedgehog 3 movie. The game was released by McDonald's as a part of it's collaborative Happy Meal campaign for the movie.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Sonic 3 McDonalds South America Mini-Game (Full Playthrough)
